DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate the effect of koji-extracted beverage fermented with Pediococcus pentosaceus LP28 on BMI and body fat in overweight subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Anti-obesity Effect of Koji-extracted Beverage Fermented With Pediococcus Pentosaceus LP28
DOC.criteria: BMI 2530 kg/m2 Taking drugs or functional food that may affect body weight or body fat Pregnant or nursing a child Participation in any clinical trial within 90 days of the commencement of the trial Renal or hepatic dysfunction Heart disease History of severe disease and/or major surgery
